member.summary: LDAP server address.

member.summary: LDAP server port for local catalog service.

member.summary: LDAP server port for global catalog service.

member.name: P:Bitai.LDAPWebApi.Configurations.LDAP.LDAPServerProfile.BaseDN
member.summary: Base distinguished name to limit searches on the LDAP server when using the local catalog service. For example: DC=it,DC=us,DC=company,DC=com

member.name: P:Bitai.LDAPWebApi.Configurations.LDAP.LDAPServerProfile.BaseDNforGlobalCatalog
member.summary: Base distinguished name to limit searches on the LDAP server when using the global catalog service. For example: DC=company,DC=com

member.summary: Default domain name.

member.name: P:Bitai.LDAPWebApi.Configurations.LDAP.LDAPServerProfile.ConnectionTimeout
member.summary: Max time to get connection to the LDAP Server.

member.name: P:Bitai.LDAPWebApi.Configurations.LDAP.LDAPServerProfile.UseSSL
member.summary: Use secure socket layer to connect to the LDAP server when using local catalog service.

member.name: P:Bitai.LDAPWebApi.Configurations.LDAP.LDAPServerProfile.UseSSLforGlobalCatalog
member.summary: Use secure socket layer to connect to the LDAP server when using global catalog service.

member.summary: Name of the domain account to connect to the LDAP server.

member.name: P:Bitai.LDAPWebApi.Configurations.LDAP.LDAPServerProfile.DomainAccountPassword
member.summary: Password of the domain account to connect to the LDAP server.
